notesStmt.note: Hebrew phrases denoted by a bar above each word; address on verso; The writer deals with various topics, and urges the addressee to cause Isaac "the teacher" ben Ḥayim "the Scribe" Nafussi (who also appears as an alternate addressee on the verso) to settle the accounts for books given to him for sale. The same Isaac appears in Cambridge T-S 24.44, dated 1102.
Condition: damaged, loss in left edge; folded in mail format.
